activities: Provision of Unified Communication and Hosted Services. The information we have is provided by clients, we do not gather it ourselves and our website is purely an informational one. The data we have been provided and hold in our datacentres consists of emails, lync conversations, location information, documentation accessed etc. as part of our service of providing unified communication services. This is held in datacentres in the UK, US, Australia and Singapore according to clients location and need. We are registered under the Data Protection Act in the UK, our Australian Office is covered under trusted country status and we have a US presence and entity and are about to open a US office in Houston where our support services will be extended to provide the same services as UK / Australia giving true follow the sun 24/7/365 support. The US staff will access or copy data information to aid the resolution of issues for the users / company involved and this will be outside of the EEA hence the need for safe harbour status.
personaldata: The information Applicable hold is provided by clients, we do not gather it ourselves via the website. The data we have been provided and held in our datacentres consists of emails, lync conversations, location information, documentation accessed etc.
privacyprograms:

recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities; for all other data: Privacy Trust (http://www.privacytrust.org/complaint/index.html).
